# Data
Read in the diabetes data using a relative path, and convert 

```{r}
diabetes_tb <- read_csv("data/diabetes_binary_health_indicators_BRFSS2015.csv") |>
                select(-c(MentHlth, DiffWalk, NoDocbcCost, Education)) |>
                mutate(across(-c(BMI, GenHlth, PhysHlth, Sex, Age, Income), \(x) factor(x, levels = c("0","1"), labels = c("No", "Yes"))),
                       GenHlth = factor(GenHlth, levels = c(1:5), labels = c("excellent", "very good", "good", "fair", "poor")),
                       BadPhysHlthDays = as.factor(PhysHlth), 
                       Sex = factor(Sex, levels = c("0", "1"), labels = c("Female", "Male")))


str(diabetes_tb)
class(diabetes_tb)
```
